sections.title: Develop self-compassion and self-regard
sections.description: Self-love skills teach you to treat yourself with kindness and compassion. We use these skills to counter self-criticism and build a healthier relationship with yourself. These practices help you develop self-acceptance, speak to yourself kindly, and validate your own experiences and emotions.

skills.title: Self Discovery
skills.description: Discover yourself to change your future.

skills.title: Self-Talk
skills.description: Shift the way you talk to yourself to shift the way you feel.

keepLearning.title: Keep Learning!
